short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Topaz SigPlusExtLite Chrome Extension enables users to capture signatures on a wide variety of Topaz signature pads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Topaz SigPlusExtLite Chrome Extension offers a mechanism for website developers and integrators to capture data from Topaz signature pads or GemView tablets in web applications using formats supported by the SigPlusExtLite SDK.
